Make a sliding scale starting at say 20% on bonuses of$ 2000 or more, up to say 45% for bonuses over 100K and say 75% for bonuses over one million dollars. Tax all stock options at the highest value of the stock in the past 5 years so that people can't load up on tanking shares that will rebound to maybe 3X their issue value.
